value:
$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|So, this is the spring festival I've been
hearing so much about...$k$pI can't say I understand the
costuming customs, but...$k$pI'll have a nice chance to spar with
all the Heroes from other worlds
who're here celebrating, at least!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|Fiiiir! Wait, my daughter!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|F-Father? Your...clothes!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|You didn't think I'd let you keep
all the fun to yourself, did you?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|Huh? Well, I... How am I supposed
to train properly if you escort
me everywhere?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|Lighten up! You'll get your training
in... AND we'll get to dominate the
battlefield as a father-daughter team!$k$pJust try to keep up, my daughter!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|*sigh*$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|Yay! Festivals are the BESTivals!
Right, Idunn?$k$p$nMPID_比翼イドゥン|Indeed...$k$p$nMPID_ファ|Oh, look! There's a bunny all in black!
...I'm gonna catch him!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_SpringFes20,Face|Hm? Wh-what are the two of you
doing here?! ...Hey! Do NOT soil
my ears!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|Ooh! Another bunny! More bunnies
means more playing. Let's go!$k$p$nMPID_比翼イドゥン|Fae, wait...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_SpringFes20,Face|This is no way to treat the festival's
guest of honor... Ingrates!$k$p$Sbs150|
